name: Haze Berry
description: A cross between Super Silver Haze and DJ Shortâ€™s famous Blueberry, Haze Berry is an 80% sativa hybrid that has become quite popular for its combination of sweet berry, indica-like flavors and sativa highs. As you might expect from a plant with two extremely potent parents, Haze Berry routinely tests at well over 20% THC, and some cultivars have a significant amount of CBD as well. In addition, it provides higher than average yields and a relatively short flowering time of 9-10 weeks, making this a very attractive strain for sativa enthusiasts. Haze Berry gives the consumer a euphoric, creativity-inducing high that gradually gives way to a profound sensation of relaxation and well-being.
attributes_title: Energetic, Happy, Euphoric, Talkative, Creative, Fatigue, Eye Pressure, Depression, Stress, Pain, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Anxious, Dry Eyes
